get.description: Returns the entire swagger spec in json.

post.description: Generates the next key in the deterministic key sequence (as determined by the master derivation key) and adds it to the wallet, returning the public key.

delete.description: Deletes the key with the passed public key from the wallet.

post.description: Export the secret key associated with the passed public key.

Import an externally generated key into the wallet. Note that if you wish to back up the imported key, you must do so by backing up the entire wallet database, because imported keys were not derived from the wallet's master derivation key.
Lists all of the public keys in this wallet. All of them have a stored private key.

post.summary: Export the master derivation key from a wallet
post.description: Export the master derivation key from the wallet. This key is a master "backup" key for the underlying wallet. With it, you can regenerate all of the wallets that have been generated with this wallet's `POST /v1/key` endpoint. This key will not allow you to recover keys imported from other wallets, however.

delete.description: Deletes multisig preimage information for the passed address from the wallet.

post.description: Given a multisig address whose preimage this wallet stores, returns the information used to generate the address, including public keys, threshold, and multisig version.
Generates a multisig account from the passed public keys array and multisig metadata, and stores all of this in the wallet.
Lists all of the multisig accounts whose preimages this wallet stores
Start a multisig signature, or add a signature to a partially completed multisig signature object.

post.summary: Sign a program for a multisig account
post.description: Start a multisig signature, or add a signature to a partially completed multisig signature object.
Signs the passed program with a key from the wallet, determined by the account named in the request.
Signs the passed transaction with a key from the wallet, determined by the sender encoded in the transaction.
Create a new wallet (collection of keys) with the given parameters.
Returns information about the wallet associated with the passed wallet handle token. Additionally returns expiration information about the token itself.

Unlock the wallet and return a wallet handle token that can be used for subsequent operations. These tokens expire periodically and must be renewed. You can `POST` the token to `/v1/wallet/info` to see how much time remains until expiration, and renew it with `/v1/wallet/renew`. When you're done, you can invalidate the token with `/v1/wallet/release`.
Invalidate the passed wallet handle token, making it invalid for use in subsequent requests.
Rename the underlying wallet to something else
Renew a wallet handle token, increasing its expiration duration to its initial value

get.description: Lists all of the wallets that kmd is aware of.

Wallet.description: Wallet is the API's representation of a wallet

WalletHandle.description:
WalletHandle includes the wallet the handle corresponds to
and the number of number of seconds to expiration

Digest.title: Digest represents a 32-byte value holding the 256-bit Hash digest.

MasterDerivationKey.description: MasterDerivationKey is used to derive ed25519 keys for use in wallets

MultisigSig.description: MultisigSig is the structure that holds multiple Subsigs

MultisigSubsig.description:
MultisigSubsig is a struct that holds a pair of public key and signatures
signatures may be empty

transaction.description:
Base64 encoding of msgpack encoding of a `Transaction` object
Note: SDK and goal usually generate `SignedTxn` objects
in that case, the field `txn` / `Transaction` of the
generated `SignedTxn` object needs to be used

TxType.description: TxType is the type of the transaction written to the ledger

VersionsResponse.description:
VersionsResponse is the response to `GET /versions`
friendly:VersionsResponse

api_key.description: Generated header parameter. This value can be found in `/kmd/data/dir/kmd.token`. Example value: '330b2e4fc9b20f4f89812cf87f1dabeb716d23e3f11aec97a61ff5f750563b78'
api_key.name: X-KMD-API-Token
